mapper.select: SELECT foster_id, foster_code, a.pet_id, a.client_id, foster_term, foster_money, foster_info, b.pet_name, b.pet_variety, b.pet_sex, b.pet_age, b.pet_status, b.pet_info, b.pet_photo, c.client_name FROM foster AS a, pet AS b, client AS c WHERE a.is_del = 0 AND a.pet_id = b.pet_id AND a.client_id = c.client_id AND foster_term >= now()
